faq.q2: What is the NFC Card technology?
faq.a2: Every ‚Çπ999 plan includes a programmed NFC Review Card. It uses 'Near Field Communication' to trigger the review page on any smartphone just by touching it‚Äîno camera or scanning required. It's the fastest way to get reviews at the checkout counter.
faq.q3: How does the AI personalized review work?
faq.a3: Our proprietary AI analyzes your business category and current rating to suggest contextually relevant review text to your customers. This eliminates 'reviewer's block' and ensures high-quality feedback.
faq.q4: Why is there a monthly fee?
faq.a4: The ‚Çπ999 monthly fee covers unlimited AI review generation, hosting of your smart review engine, real-time analytics, and maintenance of the NFC technology.
